00014 HLIST       hEventQueue = NULL;
00015 HLIST       hDelayEventQueue = NULL;
00016 HLIST       hDemandEventQueue = NULL;
00017 
00018 #define QUEUE_RESIZE          20
00019 
00020 // LOCAL FUNCTIONS
00021 HLIST GetQueue( UINT8 ubQueueID );
00022 void SetQueue( UINT8 ubQueueID, HLIST hQueue );

00025 BOOLEAN InitializeEventManager( )
00026 {
00027       // Create Queue
00028       hEventQueue = CreateList( QUEUE_RESIZE, sizeof( PTR ) );
00029 
00030       if ( hEventQueue == NULL )
00031       {
00032             return( FALSE );
00033       }
00034 
00035       // Create Delay Queue
00036       hDelayEventQueue = CreateList( QUEUE_RESIZE, sizeof( PTR ) );
00037 
00038       if ( hDelayEventQueue == NULL )
00039       {
00040             return( FALSE );
00041       }
00042 
00043       // Create Demand Queue (events on this queue are only processed when specifically
00044       // called for by code)
00045       hDemandEventQueue = CreateList( QUEUE_RESIZE, sizeof( PTR ) );
00046 
00047       if ( hDemandEventQueue == NULL )
00048       {
00049             return( FALSE );
00050       }
00051 
00052       return( TRUE );
00053 }
00054 
00055 BOOLEAN ShutdownEventManager( )
00056 {
00057       if ( hEventQueue != NULL )
00058       {
00059                   DeleteList( hEventQueue );
00060       }
00061 
00062       if ( hDelayEventQueue != NULL )
00063       {
00064                   DeleteList( hDelayEventQueue );
00065       }
00066 
00067       if ( hDemandEventQueue != NULL )
00068       {
00069                   DeleteList( hDemandEventQueue );
00070       }
00071 
00072       return( TRUE );
00073 }

00077 BOOLEAN AddEvent( UINT32 uiEvent, UINT16 usDelay, PTR pEventData, UINT32 uiDataSize, UINT8 ubQueueID )
00078 {
00079       EVENT *pEvent;
00080       UINT32 uiEventSize = sizeof( EVENT );
00081       HLIST hQueue;
00082 
00083       // Allocate new event
00084       pEvent = (EVENT *) MemAlloc( uiEventSize + uiDataSize );
00085 
00086       CHECKF( pEvent != NULL );
00087 
00088       // Set values
00089       pEvent->TimeStamp  = GetJA2Clock( );
00090       pEvent->usDelay          = usDelay;
00091       pEvent->uiEvent          = uiEvent;
00092       pEvent->uiFlags          = 0;
00093       pEvent->uiDataSize = uiDataSize;
00094       pEvent->pData                  = (BYTE*)pEvent;
00095       pEvent->pData                  = pEvent->pData + uiEventSize;
00096 
00097       memcpy( pEvent->pData, pEventData, uiDataSize );
00098       
00099       // Add event to queue
00100       hQueue = GetQueue( ubQueueID );
00101       hQueue = AddtoList( hQueue, &pEvent, ListSize( hQueue ) );
00102       SetQueue( ubQueueID, hQueue );
00103 
00104       return( TRUE );
00105 
00106 }
00107 
00108 
00109 
00110 BOOLEAN RemoveEvent( EVENT **ppEvent, UINT32 uiIndex, UINT8 ubQueueID )
00111 {
00112       UINT32 uiQueueSize;
00113       HLIST hQueue;
00114 
00115       // Get an event from queue, if one exists
00116       //
00117 
00118       hQueue = GetQueue( ubQueueID );
00119 
00120 
00121       // Get Size
00122       uiQueueSize = ListSize( hQueue );
00123 
00124       if ( uiQueueSize > 0 )
00125       {
00126             // Get
00127             CHECKF( RemfromList( hQueue , ppEvent, uiIndex ) != FALSE );
00128       }
00129       else
00130       {
00131             return( FALSE );
00132       }
00133 
00134       return( TRUE );
00135 }

00139 {

00143       // Get an event from queue, if one exists

00151 
00152       if ( uiQueueSize > 0 )
00153       {
00154             // Get
00155             CHECKF( PeekList( hQueue, ppEvent, uiIndex ) != FALSE );

00158       {
00159             return( FALSE );
00160       }
00161 
00162       return( TRUE );

00167 BOOLEAN FreeEvent( EVENT *pEvent )
00168 {
00169       CHECKF( pEvent != NULL );
00170 
00171       // Delete event
00172       MemFree( pEvent );
00173 
00174       return( TRUE );
00175 }

00178 UINT32 EventQueueSize( UINT8 ubQueueID )
00179 {
00180       UINT32 uiQueueSize;
00181       HLIST hQueue;
00182 
00183       // Get an event from queue, if one exists
00184       //
00185

00189       uiQueueSize = ListSize( hQueue );
00190       
00191       return( uiQueueSize );

00194 
00195 HLIST GetQueue( UINT8 ubQueueID )
00196 {
00197       switch( ubQueueID )
00198       {
00199             case PRIMARY_EVENT_QUEUE:
00200                   return( hEventQueue );
00201                   break;
00202 
00203             case SECONDARY_EVENT_QUEUE:
00204                   return( hDelayEventQueue );
00205                   break;
00206 
00207             case DEMAND_EVENT_QUEUE:
00208                   return( hDemandEventQueue );
00209                   break;
00210 
00211             default:
00212                   Assert( FALSE );
00213                   return( 0 );
00214                   break;
00215       }
00216 
00217 }
00218 
00219 void SetQueue( UINT8 ubQueueID, HQUEUE hQueue )
00220 {
00221       switch( ubQueueID )
00222       {
00223             case PRIMARY_EVENT_QUEUE:
00224                   hEventQueue = hQueue;
00225                   break;
00226 
00227             case SECONDARY_EVENT_QUEUE:
00228                   hDelayEventQueue = hQueue;
00229                   break;
00230 
00231             case DEMAND_EVENT_QUEUE:
00232                   hDemandEventQueue = hQueue;
00233                   break;
00234 
00235             default:
00236                   Assert( FALSE );
00237                   break;
00238       }
00239 }
